ComicInfo.Summary: Yoshimi Onomoto returns to her homeland a fugitive as Danger Club leader Kid Vigilante and his arch-nemesis Ladybug confront their pasts in the Cave of Vengeance. Old wounds are opened again, and new mysteries arise as the world faces its imminent doom.
ComicInfo.Characters: Gravity Girl,The Magician,Jack Fearless,Kid Vigilante,Ladybug,Yoshimi Onomoto
